commit.message:
jump.c (jump_optimize_1): Don't call delete_barrier_successors if only marking labels.

	* jump.c (jump_optimize_1): Don't call delete_barrier_successors
	if only marking labels.

From-SVN: r32231

+	if only marking labels.
